Event.name: Shopping
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Shopper</fen> looks for <fen>Goods</fen> in order to purchase them.
<ex><fex name="Shopper">She</fex> <t>shopped</t> <fex name="Goods">for a new hat</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Shopper
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who attempts to find the <fen>Goods</fen>. <ex><fex name="Shopper">John</fex> <t>shopped</t> for a pencil.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Ground
Arg.definition: <def-root>This is the entity to which the Cognizer pays attention. It is referred to as the <fen>Ground</fen> because it serves as the background or context for the <fen>Goods</fen>. This FE is usually expressed as a preposition phrase.</def-root>

Arg.name: Goods
Arg.definition: <def-root>This is the entity that the Ground may contain. Typically, it is expressed as a<ment>for</ment>-PP.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the shopping action is done.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An act of the <fen>Shopper</fen> that allows them to look for (and perhaps purchase) the <fen>Goods</fen>.
<ex>They <t>shopped</t> for hot items <fex name="Mns">by camping out overnight at shopping malls</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Outcome
Arg.definition: <def-root>The failure or success of an attempt.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>A spatial setting larger than the Ground in which the Shopping event occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the time when the shopping occurs.
<ex>The children were <t>shopping</t> for gifts for their parents <fex name="Time">before Christmas</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action that the Shopper intends to accomplish by performing the search.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the amount of effort put into shopping.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE describes a participant of shopping scenario as being in some state during the action.</def-root>

Arg.name: Co-participant
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Co-participant</fen> is an entity that participates in a coordinated way in the shopping event with the <fen>Shopper</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: shopping.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the purchasing of goods from shops.

lexUnit.name: shop.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: go to a shop or shops to buy goods.
